sentences.english: We are the main supplier of Dried Grass Jelly ( Mesona Chinensis) in Malaysia.
sentences.chinese: 我們是馬來西亞主要的幹仙草及食品供應商。

sentences.english: Hsian-tsao is a traditional medicinal plant in China.
sentences.chinese: 仙草爲中國傳統的藥用植物。

sentences.english: In our country has long been "dianthera" known.
sentences.chinese: 在我國早有“山珍仙草”之稱。

sentences.english: Bai Suzhen laughs in the face of death, selects the ganoderma lucidum immortal grass finally, excited goes.
sentences.chinese: 白素珍捨生忘死，終於摘取靈芝仙草，興奮而去。

sentences.english: Ganoderma Lucidum is called as Mesona chinensis, has no toxic side effects on human body.
sentences.chinese: 靈芝自古以來被稱爲“仙草”，對人體無毒無副作用。

sentences.english: Due to the heavy grief, the wife buried the left immortal grass with her husband.
sentences.chinese: 妻子非常傷心，把剩下的仙草和丈夫埋在一起。

definition: legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
all kinds of grass/all kinds of flora
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
